::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer and Perndabot arrive at the fallen ship. Their scanners had lost 
the two energy signatures.

DevilDuer looks at the ship. "Oh well, at least we salvaged a ship," he says.

Perndabot nods, walking toward the ship, "My scanners report that the CR 
chamber onboard is still functional, and the defences are partly functional," 
he says, looking down at his scanner.

DevilDuer nods. "What are we waiting for, then?" He asks and walks up to the 
ship, looking for parts to salvage. Perndabot does the same.
